MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH32 postcode area of Prestonpans, affecting properties in Fisher Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:20pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:27pm on the 12th of February 2021
